name: Siren Head and Hero Brine
description:
Welcome to Siren Head at school zombie apocalypse - the best 3D game with a story about Hero Brine, Siren Head, Hacker and Hero Brine's Girl.
Hero Brine and Siren Head at school zombie apocalypse is an adventure game to survive and destroy zombies in a cube world.
Get ready for the real Adventure!

Game Features Hero Brine and Siren Head at school
• The best game about Hero Brine 3D - defeat zombies, survive, change the skin of Hero Brine and Girl, destroy cubes and get lucky blocks
• Hero Brine and Siren Head - a shooter game for passing about Hero Brine, and not just Hero Brine mod
• Two game modes: zombie at school and Siren Head in the city
• Crafting and Survival - the main characters have an inventory of items
• Mine and craft coins and pets!
• Unique abilities of Hero Brine - from a trap to a chainsaw
• Unique abilities of the Hero Brine's Girl - from bombs to cute cats
• Many items that can modify Hero Brine and his Girl
• Speed ​​levels - escape from Siren Head and a huge zombie by car
• Different types of monsters: from zombies to skeletons and Siren Head!
• Unlock unique mobs - from Noob's brother to the monster teacher !
• Play with friendly pets, throw bombs, set traps and fight hostile inhabitants of the cube world
• Watch video screensavers between levels - learn the story of Hero Brine in the school.

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER
1. Hero Brine
2. Hero Brine's Girl

CHOOSE WEAPONS AND ITEMS
1. Various weapons (from a pistol to a chainsaw)
2. Armor and items that increase skill

CHOOSE PET
1. Chicken
2. Fox
3. Wolf
4. Creep
5. Parrot
6. The game is voting for a new pet!

CHOOSE BIOMA
1. Zombies in the school.
2. Siren Head in the city (amusement park, cafes, rooftops and much more!)

SURVIVE and BATTLE
using weapons and armor to defend against dangerous mobs and fight the Siren Head.
Fight monsters and win, find items and weapons to survive /
Destroy cubes to find lucky blocks!

Have fun and get the most incredible emotions playing the game Hero Brine, where you can fight with Siren Head, Cheater and zombies!


Like ? Do you want multiplayer? Leave a comment!
